Class EdgeLayoutBehavior

  • java.lang.Object

      • org.eclipse.gef.zest.fx.behaviors.AbstractLayoutBehavior
        • org.eclipse.gef.zest.fx.behaviors.EdgeLayoutBehavior
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IActivatable, IAdaptable.Bound<IVisualPart<? extends javafx.scene.Node>>, IBehavior

    public class EdgeLayoutBehavior
extends AbstractLayoutBehavior
    The EdgeLayoutBehavior is an EdgePart-specific AbstractLayoutBehavior implementation.
